title: Dubai co inks deal to jointly build hotel, villas in Mussoorie
description: Dubai-based Atmosphere Living has signed a joint development agreement to invest Rs 550 crore in building villas and a hotel in Mussoorie. The company also plans to expand its holiday home projects in Goa, Lonavala, Himachal Pradesh, and Jaipur, with future international prospects.
